column2: ggplot() + geom_bar(aes(x = club_name, y = average, fill = club_name), stat = "identity") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) + labs(x = "Club Name", y = "Average FPL points", title = sprintf("The average FPL points achieved by each team in the season %s", unique(df$season)))
